headline: Alaska Airlines announces largest fleet order in airline's history
summary: Alaska Airlines announced today it is ordering 105 new 737-10 aircraft and five new 787 aircraft ‚Äì exercising all previous 787 options held with Boeing. The airline also secured rights for an additional 35 737-10 aircraft. This order ‚Äì representing the largest order in the airline's history ‚Äì secures critical delivery slots and extends the aircraft delivery stream through 2035.
